website_summaries.verdict: Feature-packed vacuum sealer with numerous bags to get you started.
pros: Offers variable sealing functions to fit different needs
Comes with ample bags in a variety of sizes
cons: Doesn't always seal bags as securely as expected
There is bit of a learning curve to using it

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: After having a Food Saver for many years, it died. They didn't have my original one, so I ordered another type of Food Saver. It wasn't good, I sent it back. Then I ordered another different type of Food Saver, same thing, so I sent that one back. I finally thought about buying the Hamilton Beach Sealer machine. OMG, I loved it! It stores the roll, it has a pulse, so you can suction cookies and bread with smashing it. The other thing is that it seals without suctioning. It's the best! It has a permanent space on my counter!
customer_reviews.author: debserg

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for 8 months
customer_reviews.text: Will do the job for freezing the leftovers after dinner. However if you are packaging up dried beans or rice or the like for waterproof/airtight storage or camping or whatever be aware after about 20 uses or so in a row it stops vacuuming until it has rested for about 30 minutes or so. Even so after about 8 months it became even more inconsistent. Now after 10 months it has about 7 uses before a rest is required. Not very viable for a prepper or for a do it yourself camper type.
customer_reviews.author: Stripe

customer_reviews.title: Great for sous-vide cooking
customer_reviews.text: I've used this a few times now for sous-vide cooking of steaks. It is nice to not have to worry about water getting into the bag. I also use it to seal cheese so that it doesn't go moldy so quickly. It is inevitable once the cheese is exposed to air, so even after vacuum sealing, mold will still eventually grow.
customer_reviews.author: Gralfus

customer_reviews.title: No more wasted food!
customer_reviews.text: Now, even if you are a single person, you can buy in bulk, because the excess can be sealed into individual packages for smaller meals. I like that you can even freeze and then seal liquids into individual serving sizes or you can store a pot of soup in the freezer-without the pot! I make my own "T.V. dinners!" I just wish I had this when I was a nursing mother. It is absolutely great for moms who want to make their own baby food and even pet owners who would like to store some of their leftovers to share with their pets at a later time. It's going to be fantastic for holiday leftovers!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I Rsted 5-Stars Because It's A Hamilton Beach Product!?
customer_reviews.text: My AMAZON.com Friends, I have not yet used my vacuum sealer nor my sous vide oven-6qt-slow-cooker combo ( both Hamiltoj Beach products ), because I have had nothing to prepare just yet. But I have other Hamilton Beach products, and I have found that they study the technology of appliances costing 5-10 times the cost of the Hamilton Beach newly developed corresponding product, which usually has one or more added features which the original did not have. I will respond to the survey after I have used it. Respectfully, KSH
customer_reviews.author: KSH

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to all the other reviewers who wrote about this product. I was going to pick up a Food Saver brand sealer from Costco but I checked reviews here first and am very happy with this item.
customer_reviews.author: ABombshell

customer_reviews.title: N/A
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. It did what I want it. I like that it has a built in for the bag and a cutter to cut the bag instead of using a siscisor.
customer_reviews.author: Neng Xiong

customer_reviews.title: No freezer burn!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this before Covid and are glad we did. Now we grocery shop every few weeks and freeze our meat purchases. We pre-make hamburger patties and can thaw them quickly in the microwave to cook on the grill. Steaks, chicken, pork all thaw out with no loss of flavor, color or texture. The initial roll of bags is good for about 20 small packages, so you may want to order additional bags right away.
customer_reviews.author: Marylee

customer_reviews.title: STOPPED WORKING AFTER LESS THAN 6 MONTHS !
customer_reviews.text: tHIS VACUUM SEALER WAS OK (NOTHING SPECIAL ) BUT.... IT STOPPED WORKING AFTER 5 1/ 2 MONTHS ! IT WAS: Sold by: Amazon.com Services LLC . I WENT ON Q _ C AND BOUGHT A "FOODSAVER" BUT AM NOW OUT OF THE MONEY I SPENT ON THIS PIECE OF CR _ P HAMILTON BEACH !
customer_reviews.author: CHINATOUCHE1

customer_reviews.title: Hamilton Beach NutriFresh Vacuum Sealer Machine
customer_reviews.text: What good is a food saver if it won't airtight seal the food? I returned and went back to the 'food saver' brand that went on sale.
customer_reviews.author: laney

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Best Food Vaccuum I’ve ever owned. Extremely easy to use, and well designed.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. Our meat stayed fresh. We will try veggies next.
customer_reviews.author: Real customer - Fl

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum sealer is perfect for the two of us. It's really easy to use and we are very pleased with size. Not too big and bulky.
customer_reviews.author: L. Styron

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Exactly what I wanted. Would recommend this product. Arrived in timely manner. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Ruth A. Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is the first one that I have owned and it is great. It's just me and my wife and we always have too many leftovers and this is great for saving them in the freezer to be reheated later...so much less waste in our house!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad Product: do not buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had problems with this sealer from the start. I should have returned it, but it was a named product. Now after only 4 months it's complete broken. Mod. 78214.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Rees

customer_reviews.title: this is so easy to use and high quality
customer_reviews.text: WOW, this is so easy to use and high quality! Highly recommend for freezing foods!
customer_reviews.author: Percy L. Schlimm

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This was Father's Day gift and he loves it. He hunts during the winter and this will help to process the meat
customer_reviews.author: RUTHIE PRESTON

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after two uses.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my parents-in-law for Christmas last year. She just told me that she's only used it twice and it quit working. How can I get a replacement??? It was $100! Not a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Beware! Avoid this seller and product at all cost!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter bought this product as a gift for us. The chamber seal failed on the very first use. No exchange or replacement was offered by this seller. We will not be purchasing anymore items from this Seller.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: No power cord
customer_reviews.text: Came without a DC adaptor. How am I supposed to use it. Completely frustrated that now I have to find a power source. For the money, why would it not be included?!?!?
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Miller

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I have always thought this might be good to have around for left overs or when buying food from Costco which usually comes in large quantities. Ham is a good example. I was surprised how easy this sealer was to use. I don't have experience with any other. Wow, it has simple, easy to follow instructions. I sealed my left over Costco chicken in no time. I was really impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Seal broke after 4 times being used.
customer_reviews.text: After being used 4 times the seal broke and it will no longer seal foods. Very disappointing! Would not purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: lfish24

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice works better then the one i replaced it with really easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Like
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas present for my daughter she likes it a lot no issues with it also easy to use
customer_reviews.author: angela crist

customer_reviews.title: Hamilton Beach 78220 Vacuum Sealer Machine
customer_reviews.text: love it.... easy to run, just have to figure it out first.... should be a money saver for us
customer_reviews.author: CINDY HOWIE

customer_reviews.title: Operation
customer_reviews.text: It’s not as easy to use as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not deal
customer_reviews.text: This product would not even seal the bag roll to form the initial “bottom” of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: tim  grondin

customer_reviews.title: Vacuum seal
customer_reviews.text: I used the this product twice and the vacuum seal quit working on it and wasn't able to return the product.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed! Easy to use!! I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Edna H.

customer_reviews.title: Vacuum stopped working
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum function stopped working the fourth time I used the machine. Garbage!
customer_reviews.author: Chikeys

customer_reviews.title: LEMON!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it and it was completely useless, except for the bag sealer. That is all mine will do. The locks won't work, the bag cutter doesn't work (I used scissors) and the vacuum doesn't work either. I had 4 other people try it, we read the manual, watched videos, asked friends, nothing helped. I got a LEMON!! I wasted my money on something I really wanted for my family.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Farkas, Jr

customer_reviews.title: Highly rec
customer_reviews.text: This has been an amazing little gadget so far. I use it frequently, too; several times a week. It also has worked for medium-moist foods. It’s even kept freshly-cut-and-peeled avocado (in the fridge) as green as the moment it was cut even as long as 2 months, though I’ve not gone longer than that. I don’t know what else to say about it other than it has met and exceeded expectations.
customer_reviews.author: karhill54

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This was not an expensive machine but it works perfectly every time (so far).It’s easy to use, lightweight, comes with lots of bags! So far so great!
customer_reviews.author: River Lass

customer_reviews.title: Read the booklet
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't get the vacuum to work first time....had to read the booklet DUHHH. Great item and the next one vacuum sealed great. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Dulin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my family of five!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely should have purchased this vacuum sealer many years ago !
customer_reviews.author: Angela & Gavin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love this. It’s easy to use and will save us money by keeping food good longer. I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Hamilton Beach NutriFresh Vacuum Sealer Machine with Bag Cutter, BPA Free Food Sealing Starter Kit, Silver (78220)
product_meta.description: Color:SilverPreserving fresh foods, bulk buys and leftovers is easy with the Hamilton Beach Nutri fresh Vacuum sealer. Save money by purchasing In bulk and then safely seal and freeze meat, fish, fruits and vegetables. Don’t let your garden Harvest go to waste. Preserve your bounty and enjoy the fresh food year round. This easy to use vacuum sealer for food comes with enough materials to seal 20+ gallons, so you can get started right away. It has versatile controls that include Vacuum & seal for traditional sealing, seal-only for making bags from rolls, and a pulse feature with adjustable high and low settings that give you more control for fragile foods. Normal seal allows for dry food Vacuum sealing, and extended seal for moist foods. Save money and keep food fresh with the Hamilton Beach Vacuum sealer.
feature_bullets: Locks air out to keep freshness in. This vacuum sealer for food is easy to use thanks to the bag alignment with extra-wide vacuum chamber

Built-in cutter to customize bag size. A convenient roll storage and bag cutter make creating any size bag simple. Just pull the material through, slide the cutter across the bag and seal one end to make your ideal size.

Versatile control. This vacuum sealer features versatile controls that allow you to vacuum and seal for traditional sealing or vacuum only for sealing of delicate foods. Normal seal allows for dry food Vacuum sealing and extended seal for moist foods. The pulse button, combined with adjustable high/low levels gives you better control over crushable foods.

Save money & preserve freshness. Save money by purchasing In Bulk then safely vacuum seal and freeze meats, cheeses, fruits and vegetables. And preserving your garden harvest is easier than ever with the Hamilton Beach nutrifresh vacuum sealer.

EVERYTHING YOU NEED TO GET STARTED. Included with the vacuum sealer machine are an 11 in. x 20 ft. roll (twice as long as FoodSaver FM24350ECR; makes 15 gallon-size bags), 4 gallon-size bags, and 6 quart-size bags – enough material to preserve 20+ gallons.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars143 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
